channel.title: Few problems i need help with
channel.description: Well firstly im on a blank source.. and im wondering how to make it so its not wild everywhere and how to make it so i need a pickaxe to mine ore i coded mineing in today and i dont no the code to make it so you need a pickaxe to mine. and the max level is 100 how do i make it 99?

item.source: Few problems i need help with

item.title: Few problems i need help with
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

try finding something like this [code]
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
}

[/code] change it to that and the max level will be 99 again

Read full topic
